subject: Wow that's good!
body:
Wow that's good!





Wow that's good!







 





This Small Company Could Steal 
                  Millions of Dollars in Sales From 
                  Beverage Giants Coke and Pepsi. . . 


. . . And Make You Rich in 
                    The Next Six Months!

Imagine the opportunity ... an innovative dynamic company 
                        with an exciting new product in a rapidly developing 
                      $36 billion niche market.

Fellow Investor,
  Its true. Carbonated beverage consumption is dwindling.
                      Sales of carbonated soda beverages declined two years in a row because consumers are rapidly switching to healthier products. 
Market share gains are going to innovative beverage companies like Celsius (OTCBB: CSUH), which is profiled in this report.                  
Most importantly, savvy investors are bagging terrific profits from this emerging consumer trend. 
                  For example, early investors in Hansen Natural rode this natural beverage producer to gains of 3,108% from 2004 through 2006.
More recently, Jones Soda, another new beverage company with healthful products virtually doubled over-night when they announced they are reformulating their products using cane sugar in place of the industry standard, high fructose corn syrup.
You too could potentially bag huge profits like these by taking a position in my latest recommendation  Celsius Holdings, Inc. (OTCBB: CSUH).
                  Celsius is like Hansen and Jones, but it is carving out a whole new beverage category with one of the hottest new beverages on the market.


Im heartily recommending Celsius because the company has all the ingredients for success: Innovation, brand recognition, customer appeal, astute management and strong distribution partnersThese are the keys to success in the beverage industry and Celsius has them all.  I urge you to learn more about this exciting opportunity. The profit potential is enormous.
Innovative New Product  Category Killer

Celsius new product is a flavorful, healthful carbonated soft drink that has the potential to become the ultimate diet soft drink and even more because of its remarkable calorie burning qualities.
Yes, were talking about net-negative calories. Celsius is the first soda clinically proven to raise metabolism and burn calories. The company provides proof positive of its claim that their drink increases metabolism by 12% over a three hour period.
Available in five tasty flavors, the soda also contains a flavorful blend of natural ingredients including nutrients, caffeine and botanicals. That makes the product desirable not only for diet-conscious consumers, but also the rapidly growing energy drink market.
Celsius contains Green Tea with EGCG, Ginger, Calcium, Chromium, caffeine, vitamins and nutrients. With these ingredients and even more importantly, NO carbs, NO sugar, NO chemical preservatives, NO high fructose corn syrup and Very Low sodium, you can see why Celsius distinct product advantages are driving strong consumer acceptance.

The Buzz 

You may not be aware of it but, if you are, you already know Celsius is showing up everywhere in the news. The company hardly needs to pay for celebrity endorsement as the product already has incredible press and TV coverage. 
It has been featured in over 1,000 television segments, viewed by an estimated 80 million people. Perhaps you saw Celsius on the Food Network Unwrapped TV show or read about Celsius being in celebrity gift bags at the Oscars.

The star of NBCs Todays Show, Matt Lauer said to millions of viewers after taking a sip of Celsuis, Wow! Thats Good!

In addition to notable celebrities, the beverage industry is excited about Celsius. Beverage Industry Magazine gave Celsius their Best New Beverage Award for 2006. Celsius was also a finalist for the prestigious CSP Retailer Choice Best New Product of 2006. 
Celsius was a double winner in Beverage Innovation Magazines 2007 Global Beverage Innovation Awards. The product received the Best New Functional Drink for 2007 and was runner-up in the Best New Health Initiative category.
Theres no question the beverage giants know about Celsius exciting new product. Could that mean a buy-out is in the future for the company? 
You bet a buy-out could happen, but even without a buyout, which often explodes the current share price, Celsius stock isnt going to trade in its current $1.00-$1.25 range for very long because
Expanding Distribution 

Distribution is a major key to success in the beverage industry. Impressively, the company is aligning themselves with top flight distributors capable of meeting the companys aggressive sales growth targets.
Celsius is currently adding distributors in key regional markets and is well on their way to complete national distribution. 
For example, they just announced Fred W. Losch Beverage Company as their distributor in suburban Chicago. Losch adds more than 1,800 accounts. Combined with Skokie Valley Beverage Company, which picked up the account in March, Celsius is now available across the third largest metropolitan area in the country with over 9 million thirsty consumers.

In New Mexico the company added 2,000 accounts by signing up Primo Beverages. Dan Rosado, Primos President, commented, Celsius is different than most of the products we see in that it has a unique quality and its easy to see how consumers would be looking for its calorie burning and energy providing aspects.
Dan continuedCelsius is an exciting product for us, from the packaging to the great refreshing taste and functional benefits. Weve already placed Celsius in some of our leading accounts including Raleys Grocery and many fitness facilities and truly believe it will be a hit with our customers.
When distributors get excited about a new product you know it is going to be successful.

We believe there is a huge opportunity to address 
the various channels we service. We are convinced 
Celsius has targeted the right consumer.
--Fred Losch

Experienced Management 

Celsius has a solid management team and they are adding more industry heavy hitters to assure their continued success.
For example, Erin Heit was recently appointed Marketing VP. Heit brings solid industry experience from upstarts Fuze and Glaceau Vitaminwater. She has the industry contacts and knows how to grow the companys revenues.
I encourage you to read more about the companys management team on the companys website. When you do, Im sure youll agree they are very capable of making Celsius a company as great as their product.
Exciting Opportunity 

Launched in early 2006, Celsius is rapidly gaining traction in the retail marketplace. But from an investors perspective, the company remains below Wall Street analysts radar. 
Thats great, because its an opportunity for early investors to make large profits as the stock price moves up, up, up. 
With distribution underway and expansion across major markets, quarterly revenue and earnings comparisons will be explosive and so will the stock price. 
In addition, with merger mania running wild across global corporate executive offices and board rooms, I wouldnt be surprised if this company and their innovative product was an acquisition target by a major beverage company.
But even without a buy-out, the outstanding acceptance of their product along with the broadening of their distribution, it wont take long for the company to reach sales of $10 million per quarter.

Jones was a $317 million dollar company when it reported quarterly sales of $10 million. When Celsius sales take off in the near future like I expect them tothe company could easily reach a similar valuation. That would result in the stock exploding to $3.25 a share, or a 225% gain.
And thats when the company captures only $40 million of sales in a $36 billion market. Longer-term I expect the company could easily surpass Jones current market valuation, which would produce an outstanding 549% return when the share price tops $6.50.
When you consider Celsius could be the most important development in the beverage industry since diet sodas became popular in the 1980s, you can see why Im highly recommending adding shares to your portfolio.
Invest in Celsius Holdings now, before others discover this sparkling beverage industry gem. Early investors could make exceptional profits in the months ahead as consumers drive Celsius sales through the roof.

Eric Dany
